pages.text: $(li)The Shiba is a new friendly dog that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l) and interacted in the same way that regular $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolves$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will also lay down if you're having them sit on a bed!
$(li)These creatures also fetch any $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Weapons$(/l) after they land and bring them back to you.
$(li)If you are holding a $(l:patchouli:decorations/others/torchs)Torch$(/l), Shibas will also look for dark spots and get mad at them.
